text:
At least, in my version.  I'm using win2k, 4dos version 2.52A.  For me to run 
ant properly, I had to change the line in bin\ant.bat from

if "%eval[2+2]" == "4" goto setup4NT

to

if "%@eval[2+2]" == "4" goto setup4NT

for the variable function eval to work properly
creator: alan@coldsmoke.com
steve_l@iseran.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 3654 ***
